experience.description: Working on different projects for clients. Building websites and web applications using Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and other technologies.
Create and set up tests to check how well different parts of web3 applications work together
Conducting hands-on evaluation and verification of Intelligent Automation (IA) data gathering tools through manual testing.
Maintain and improve the company's website and internal tools

projects.title: Photo Gallery
projects.description: This is a photo gallery that I build for a photographer. It's a simple website that showcases his work. Uses Contentful for the media management. It's built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS. Hosted on Vercel.

projects.title: News Website
projects.description: A news website focusing on political events in the province of Buenos Aires, Argentina. Built and maintained with Wordpress.

projects.title: Ecommerce Store
projects.description: Ecommerce website for a local store. Built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS. Using Zustand for state management.

projects.title: Portfolio V1
projects.description: First iteration of my portfolio website.
